text: DYES (657 AM) Radyo Pilipinas is a radio station owned and operated by Philippine Broadcasting Service. The station's studio is located in the Capitol Site, Brgy., Alang-Alang, Borongan.DYES ushers 22nd year of public information service to EstehanonsMissing fishermen in Eastern Samar now safely homeWinners of ‘Go! title: DYES-AM
